mapper.select: select rn, no ,title, content, hit, regDate, name from (select rownum rn, no, title, content, hit, regDate, name from (select board.no no, title, content, hit, reg_date regDate, name from board, users where users.no = board.user_no order by board.no asc) order by rn desc) where rn > #{startNo} and rn <= #{endNo}
